invitations.invitationToSend: Invitation will be sent after access is saved
invitations.greeting: It seems as if you have been invited to an access to someone's door by the KIWI.KI application. Please, choose which action should be performed.
invitations.errorAccepting: An error occured. Check if the invitation token is valid; please remember that you can only accept a particular invitation once, and it is only valid for 48 hours.
invitations.typeEmails: Invite people by e-mail (type below, separate e-mails with commas or space):
invitations.accept2: Log in with another e-mail and accept the invitation
invitations.accept3: Log in and accept the invitation
invitations.accept4: Create a new account and accept the invitation

emptyList.noKiPt1: You do not have any KIWI Ki in your account. Would you like to
emptyList.noDoor: You do not have access to any doors. If KIWI is available in your building, please contact support.
emptyList.noAccesses: You have not defined any accessess. Until you do, your KIWI Ki will not function.

login.error: The login you provided does not match an account in our records. Please try again.

register.passwordsDontMatch: Both passwords must be the same.
register.success: Thank you for registering. Please check your email for the activation link.
register.greeting: In order to use our services, an account is required. Simply enter your e-mail and password below, agree to our Terms and Services, then click "Create." After confirming your e-mail address, you can begin immediately.
register.failure: Invalid request. Please try clicking the link again or contact support.
register.TOSfailure: You must accept our terms and services in order to proceed.
register.name: Name
register.wrongEmail: Given email address is not correct.
register.alreadyRegistered: This email adready exists in our database. You can only have one account per email address.
register.migrate_instruction: As existing KIWI user, please enter your KIWI customer number and Ki PIN, that you received by mail to register within the KIWI App.
register.passwordChangeFailure: Could not change the password. Make sure your old password is correct.
register.changePasswordConfirm: Are you sure you want to change your password?

resetPwd.greeting: Have you forgotten your password? Enter your e-mail below and a reset link will be sent to your inbox. If you have further problems, please contact support.
resetPwd.step2: Please specify your new password below.
resetPwd.reseted: Your password has been reset. Check your e-mail inbox and follow the instructions.
resetPwd.fail1: Sorry! Something went wrong. Check if the given e-mail is correct.

account.new_email_guide: You will receive confirmation link to both new and old email account.
account.emailChangeSsuccess: You should receive a confirmation link to your new e-mail address shortly. Please follow instructions given in the email in order to complete the process.
account.emailChangeConfirmed: You can now login with new e-mail address
account.plan_migration: Dear Customer, by creating a new access, you request to get upgraded to the PREMIUM-Package. The PREMIUM-Package costs € 5,90 monthly and enables you to create up to 8 permanent accesses that you can share to your own convenience. You will be able to manage them according to your needs, i.e., you can hold 3 for your family and still invite 5 friends to your doors. For further information follow the next link: https://kiwi.ki/en/preisuebersicht-bewohner/
account.changePasswordConfirm: Are you sure you want to change your password?
account.change_data: Do you want to change your account data?
account.set_bank_account: Do you want to set the above as your payment method?

error.changeEmail: Your e-mail could not be changed. Make sure there is no KIWI account registered under provided e-mail.
error.sameEmail: You have to provide an email different from your current one.

data.update_note: You will be charged 1€ which will be returned immediately after we verify your credit card. Please note that updating your credit card data will not affect the application immediately.
data.update_confirm: Do you really want to update your credit card data?
data.security_note: KIWI.KI GmbH won’t store any of your credit card data. All data will be stored by our certified payment provider Adyen.
data.bank_pending: There's a payment method pending approval in your account already.
data.information_incorrect: Entered information is incorrect. Please check all entered fields.
